channel.title: Uploading my server to a web host - same as dedicated?
channel.description: ye. i sound like a complete dumb ass, dont get me wrong. I was wondering, if i could upload my server to my webhost, and actualy run it like a dedicated? I have good bandwith and if needed i could get more, i'm just wondering if it's posible?

item.title: Uploading my server to a web host - same as dedicated?
item.dc:creator: @enzroc enzroc
item.description:
@enzroc wrote:

I own a hosting company but it will go out of business cause i cant afford next months bill i will see if i can host my server on it

Read full topic
item.source: Uploading my server to a web host - same as dedicated?

item.title: Uploading my server to a web host - same as dedicated?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

You can’t unless the 'web’host supports Java servlet/applet hosting. Which most free ones dont. Plus its a server and it accepts connections - the only way to really go would be a dedicated or host it yourself.

Remembering from IRC, though, lawl or somebody mentioned a way to write a server in PHP and having HTML requests giong back and forth to communicate client-server. It would take forever, and is kind of pointless as the owner would eventually find out. Good luck with that.

Read full topic
item.source: Uploading my server to a web host - same as dedicated?

item.title: Uploading my server to a web host - same as dedicated?
item.dc:creator: @Ixl_Adds_Ixl Ixl Adds Ixl
item.description:
@Ixl_Adds_Ixl wrote:

you probably would need a php coder and GUI developer lol. I don’t know much about this myself but currently I am studying it so best way I know is from php development. Its really good if you don’t want any lag on your server.
